function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Complex natural and social factors influencing epidemic prevention","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difference between estimated covid-19 trend and actual trend in wuhan","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difference between population distribution and actual situation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in geographical environmental factors impacting the effectiveness of covid-19 prevention and control measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limitations in mapping model parameters to geographical space","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of data on spatiotemporal attributes such as patients’ tracking data, residents’ activity data, passengers’ travel data of buses and subways, and mobile location data","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in obtaining data in a public health safety emergency, which usually features missing or incomplete coverage","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on a generalized model without simulation for the fine-grained location of patients","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited detection in rural areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of detailed epidemic data","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Problems with scientific verification of spread models","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Utilizing multi-source data, such as network news data, global event databases, and remote sensing data, may pose privacy and data security risks.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mapping socioeconomic data and grid areas may raise concerns about the misuse of economic and resource allocation information.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Analyzing crowd aggregation and interaction may lead to an increased risk of disease propagation if not handled carefully.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective quarantine measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Hospital isolation measures were effective in reducing the number of infected humans but had a small effect on the arrival time of the maximum number of infected humans and the duration of the covid-19 outbreak.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Self-protection measures were effective in reducing the number of infected humans and delaying the arrival of the peak number of infected humans, but had little effect under stricter quarantine measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"The study analyzed the impact of quarantine, self-protection, and hospital isolation measures to slow the spread of covid-19, with high interpretability and geographical mapping of model parameters for practical intervention significance.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Incomplete data on reported cases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reference to external sources without context","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 globally","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 through respiratory system","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertain origin of sars-cov-2","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Viral infections caused by coronaviruses continue to emerge and pose a severe public health problem.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Highly contagious nature and relatively long incubation period of sars-cov-2 can lead to silent carriers and high basic reproductive number for covid-19 virus.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Susceptibility of sars-cov-2 to heat and ultraviolet uv light may affect virus transmission under certain conditions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Absence of specific treatment or vaccine for covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Asymptomatic transmission of covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Higher risk of severe illness for older adults and those with existing medical conditions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Human-to-human transmission of covid-19 through respiratory droplets","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential transmission of covid-19 via unsymptomatic individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survival of covid-19 virus on surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of preventive measures for covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Large-scale research and development efforts for vaccines and treatments","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate clinical understanding of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Studying patients with covid-19, including those with a direct link to the epicenter, poses a risk of exposure to the virus for the researchers.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reviewing a small subset of literature on covid-19 may lead to incomplete understanding of the disease and its characteristics.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive review of the covid-19 outbreak and its potential implications","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"No work in the existing literature reviewing the role of emerging technologies in managing the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Historical pandemics and their impact on humankind","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of disease from birds to humans","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Vulnerability of young and healthy individuals to h1n1 virus","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Continued evolution and mutation of influenza viruses","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of new strains of influenza virus leading to pandemics","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 with distinct stages of transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sporadic cases of covid-19 leading to local transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Clusters of covid-19 cases with unknown transmission source","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Community transmission leading to large outbreaks and high number of incidents and deaths","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid outbreak of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Stringent lockdown measures in automotive industry","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
